attributes.action: Give All Citizens 3 Days Off To Celebrate Eid
attributes.additional_details: I believe that if we can have many days off on other religious holidays such as Christmas, Halloween, Easter and more. This shows that Eid should be celebrated too as it is as important as other religious holidays. I also think that even though not all British citizens are Muslims, we should still respect it like we do with Christmas, Halloween and Easter.
attributes.background: I would like to start this petition so all citizens of the UK can have 3 days off. This is going to be to celebrate Eid and show that all cultures are welcome and are part of our community.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/729307
